name: Democracy Droid!
tagline: This (free as in speech) application streams and downloads Democracy Now! The war and peace report.
body:
# Free Democracy Now! for Android This application streams, either in audio or video, the independent media broadcast Democracy Now! The War and Peace Report. Find it on the google PlayStore. ##Democracy Now?!? Democracy Now! is a national, daily, independent, award-winning news program hosted by journalists Amy Goodman and Juan Gonzalez. Pioneering the largest public media collaboration in the U.S. ##Disclaimer The episodes are licensed under Creative Commons, Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 United States. I have no affiliation with Democracy Now! (they won't even return my emails). ###Project Democracy Droid uses the SimplisticRss library by ShirwaM and Picasso. ###Planned features
  • Add podcast (audio) downloads.
  • Fix descriptions.
  • Individual Story Feed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
